sentences.en: A grey carpet was removed to reveal the original pine floor.
sentences.cn: 一块灰色的地毯被揭开，露出了原来的松木地板。

sentences.en: a pine table with four matching chairs
sentences.cn: 一张松木桌子和四把配套的椅子

sentences.en: A thrush alighted on a branch of the pine tree.
sentences.cn: 一只鸫落在松树的树枝上。

sentences.en: Both rooms have antiqued pine furniture.
sentences.cn: 两个房间里都有仿古松木家具。

sentences.en: Early settlers built frames of spruce, maple and pine.
sentences.cn: 早期的定居者用云杉木、枫木和松木建造屋架。

sentences.en: He seemed to pine for his lost youth.
sentences.cn: 他似乎很怀念逝去的青春。

sentences.en: Make sure your pet won't pine while you're away.
sentences.cn: 要确保不在家时宠物不会想你。

sentences.en: Six months after he left, she was still pining.
sentences.cn: 他离开六个月了，她还是很悲伤。

sentences.en: Somewhere in the depths of the pine forest an identical sound reverberated.
sentences.cn: 从松林深处传来一声回响。

sentences.en: The carpet of pine needles was soft underfoot.
sentences.cn: 脚下厚厚的松针踩上去软绵绵的。

sentences.en: The cheerful room was panelled in pine.
sentences.cn: 那间敞亮宜人的房间装有松木护墙板。

sentences.en: The ground was thickly carpeted with pine needles.
sentences.cn: 地上落了厚厚的一层松针。

sentences.en: The towering pine and cypress trees defy frost and snow.
There are pine trees as far as the eye can see.
sentences.cn: 放眼望去，除了松树还是松树。

sentences.en: There is an old pine tree in front of the house.
sentences.cn: 房子前面有一株老松树.

words.tran_cn: 压紧的；痛苦的；困难的；收缩的
牛羊贫血病；牛羊营养不良症

trans.tran_en: a tall tree with long hard sharp leaves that do not fall off in winter
If you pine for something, you want it very much, especially when it is unlikely that you will be able to have it
If you pine for something, you want it very much, especially when it is unlikely that you will be able to have it

trans.tran_cn: 为…悲哀，哀悼，消瘦，渴望，渴慕
